data.name: AggregateNotFound
data.value: An aggregate with the identifier '{0}' was not found.

data.name: AndConjunction
data.value: and

data.name: CreatingSnapshotsUnsupported
data.value: The aggregate does not support creating snapshots.

data.name: DuplicatePersistence
data.value: Persistence has already been mapped for an entity with the name '{0}'.

data.name: InvalidPropertyExpression
data.value: The expression '{0}' does not refer to a property.

data.name: InvalidSaga
data.value: The type {0} is not a saga.

data.name: InvalidSagaPropertyExpression
data.value: The members used to correlate sagas to messages must be properties. Change the member {1} on type {0} to a property.

data.name: KeyNotFound
data.value: An item with the {0} could not be found.

data.name: MissingCommandHandler
data.value: A handler has not been registered for the {0} command.

data.name: MissingPersistence
data.value: Persistence has not been mapped for an entity with the name '{0}'.

data.name: MissingSagaStartMessage
data.value: A saga must be started by at least one message. Add one or more implementations of {0} or {1} to saga type {2}.

data.name: MultipleCommandHandlers
data.value: Multiple handlers have been registered for the {0} command, but only a single handler is allowed. The registered handlers were: {1}

data.name: MultipleSagaImplementations
data.value: The type {0} implements multiple sagas. Only a single saga implementation per type is supported.

data.name: NoConfiguredMessageReceiver
data.value: A message receiver has not been configured.

data.name: NoConfiguredMessageSender
data.value: A message sender has not been configured.

data.name: NoConfiguredPersistence
data.value: Persistence has not been configured.

data.name: NoConfiguredSagaStorage
data.value: Sagas are not currently supported because no saga storage has been configured.

data.name: OrConjunction
data.value: or

data.name: SagaCorrelationPropertyModified
data.value: The value of the correlated property {0} on saga {1} has changed from '{2}' to '{3}'. Changing the value of correlated properties at runtime is currently not supported.

data.name: SagaCorrelationPropertyUnassigned
data.value: The correlated property {0} on saga {1} does not have a value. A correlation property must have a non-default value assigned when a new saga instance is created.

data.name: SagaDoesNotSupportTimeout
data.value: The saga {0} does not support timeouts for the {1} event because the saga does not implement {2}.

data.name: SagaIdModified
data.value: A change to the ISagaData.Id property on the saga {0} has been detected. This property is for infrastructure purposes only and should not be modified.

data.name: SagaNotCorrelated
data.value: The saga {0} must be correlated to at least one property defined by the messages that trigger its activation.

data.name: SagaPropertyExpressionIncompatible
data.value: The saga property {0} of type {1} does not match the message property {2} of type {3}.

data.name: SingleParameterMethodNotFound
data.value: A method with a single parameter of type {0} and no return value was not found.

data.name: TooManySagaCorrelationProperties
data.value: Sagas can only be correlated on a single property, but the properties {1} were configured for the saga of type {0}.

data.name: UnhandledSagaMessage
data.value: The saga {0} is correlated to message {1} in the CorrelateUsing method, but the saga does not handle that message. If the saga is supposed to handle this message, then it should implement {2}.

data.name: UnmappedSagaStartMessage
data.value: The message type {0} can start the saga {1}, but the saga does not have a mapping between the message and saga data. Define the correlation between the message and the saga using the CorrelateUsing method.

data.name: UnsupportedCorrelationValueType
data.value: The type {0} is not supported for correlated properties. Change the correlation property {1} on saga {2} to Guid, String, Int16, Int32, Int64, UInt16, UInt32, or UInt64.
